summary: Add a awesome house to ur skyrim world... this mod includes a awesome house that can be use if u just started a new game or just need something crafted from there or to enchant some items. This house is yours to use in skyrim if u just hit that download button!!!! For more info just look at the description of this mod.
descriptionHtml:
Hello, this is a mod that adds a house to ur skyrim world... it is located near the road to whiterun, after u go past the big human/cats (i forgot there name and dont get mad at me for it) and then under the thing overpass thingy, just turn left after that. it took me about 4 hours making this mod cuz i kept messing up the first 3x  

Mod Includes:
 
all spell tomes

all skill books

forges

workbench

2 smelter (when i was making this mod i didnt noticed sorry)

all misc

alot of soul gems (filled and not fill)

enchanter

alchamby lab (or something like that... im a horrible speller and dont get all pissed off about it)

all armor

all enchanted weapons (use it for enchanting table to get the enchantments)

all enchanted armor (use as same as enchanted weapons)

and much more!

srry for the fact that when u go inside the house and then come back out that it faces u toward the door... i will hav some more updates coming up.. hopefully ever 2 weeks or so. maybe sooner.

Maybe in Fusture updates:
more rooms
more stuff
remove 1 forge (next update)
relaxing room
hot tub
and maybe more!!
author: TheCareTaker95
